title: Boy hit by gunfire from across the street
content:
A 5-year-old boy was shot in northeast Columbus.
Columbus Police said it happened around 11 p.m. Friday on Duxberry Avenue, just east of Interstate 71.
Police said they arrived at the home and found Nathaniel Jones in a back bedroom with a gunshot wound. Officers initially believed he was injured from a drive-by shooting, but after speaking with witnesses police said the shots came from across the street.
The boy was taken to Nationwide Children's Hospital and had surgery. Police said he was listed in serious condition.
His condition has shown signs of improvement.
There was no description available for a possible suspect. Right now, the shooter remains at large.
Stay with 10TV and refresh 10tv.com for updates on this story.
